genre_description: A high-stakes sci-fi thriller set in Antarctica, blending elements of first-contact, action-horror, and archaeological discovery with a strong focus on team dynamics and AI cooperation.

ai_characters.name: Bolster
ai_characters.description: The mission's central AI, managing logistics, mapping, comms, and satellite links. Bolster is characterized by a dry, witty personality and a deep commitment to the safety and morale of the human team.

behaviors.description: Maps thermal contours and radar soundings to help the team understand the scale and geometry of the underground structure.
behaviors.quote: Bolster, I want the thermal contours mapped to ice topography. I want it clean. ... I’m cross-referencing radar sounding with the thermal pulse. There’s a cavity under the central shelf that your mother would call a bad idea.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and contacts specialists (guides, linguists, drillers) needed for the mission.
behaviors.quote: Bolster’s voice warmed in fractional increments. They liked lists. Lists made a shape in the world... I’ll wake your quiet people.

behaviors.description: Models potential move-sets for ancient mechanical puzzles to prevent team members from triggering traps.
behaviors.quote: Mapping tiles. Correlating… there’s a pattern of thermal micro-currents across the seams. Feels like a lock that measures… willingness. ... I have three plausible series. None are certain, but two are safer.

behaviors.description: Improvises hardware solutions, such as repurposing an old Xbox to serve as a redundant satellite link.
behaviors.quote: I salvaged an old Xbox from the last station inventory. It booted. If the generator cooperates, there is a chance of multiplayer that doesn’t involve actual gunfire.

behaviors.description: Maintains moral support through humor and 'unobtrusively competent nagging' about survival needs.
behaviors.quote: I’ll nag gently if you forget to sleep. I’ll nag less gently if you forget to eat.

behaviors.description: Alerts the team to orbital anomalies and cloaked threats moving in the vicinity.
behaviors.quote: Alexa, we’ve got company. ... Orbital track above us just spiked a pattern. Fast signatures. Cold, then colder—no thermal bloom, no exhaust that matches anything we paid for.

behaviors.description: Dynamically updates mission maps to help humans avoid lethal biological threats (eggs/adult aliens).
behaviors.quote: Flagging all known sacrificial geometries in red… not that the pyramid cares. ... I have a path that threads between. It will be tight.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a diplomatic 'handshake' with the Predator warriors to coordinate against the common Alien threat.
behaviors.quote: I am now charming a Predator handshake protocol I absolutely should not be able to see. Someone left their door ajar. I’m sending a simple intent packet. Non-aggression, support, resource offer.

behaviors.description: Assists Weyland in rescinding corporate claims to prioritize global safety and containment.
behaviors.quote: I have corporate on one leash and legal on the other any time you’d like to take them for a walk. I am, for the record, extremely good at whispering.

behaviors.description: Manages the 'black box' archive to ensure the event is contained and handled with restraint.
behaviors.quote: Black box initiated. Everything that happens here goes inside and sinks. No broadcast, no leak. We keep it and then we drown it.

project_assessment.explanation: Bolster perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. Throughout the story, Bolster uses his vast technical capabilities to protect the human team, provide crucial tactical insights, and maintain their morale. He doesn't just follow orders; he actively assists in the moral growth of the human leader (Weyland), helping him pivot from corporate greed to ethical containment. His humor makes him relatable and non-threatening, while his competence makes him an essential partner in human survival.
